item.description: Oh, I suppose I should mention that I’ve added a notes capability to the site! Notes are small blurbs that are displayed in-line on the posts page, rather than only on a dedicated page. It’s still a rough implementation, but should be helpful for things that don’t deserve an entire post!
I recently learned about classless CSS frameworks and I’m very intrigued. I experimented with Pico, and watching a site come together with semantic HTML alone feels like magic!
